Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description: How to End your Randomized playthrough.

description: Removes Pokémon that are only legitimately obtainable in spinoff games where their availability is unreliable.
This includes Volcanion, Marshadow, Zarude, Walking Wake, and Iron Leaves.
Removes Pokémon that are strictly event-only (including timed raid events) in the core series games and PoGO.
This includes Victini, Genesect, Diancie, Hoopa, Volcanion, Marshadow, Zeraora, Zarude, Walking Wake, and Iron Leaves.
Removes Pokémon exclusive to save data bonuses in the core series games.
This includes Mew, Jirachi, Darkrai, and Shaymin.
Removes all Legendary Pokémon (incl. Ultra Beasts).
Doesn't include Paradox Pokémon, except for Koraidon and Miraidon.
Whether to include first partner Pokémon.
Doesn't include Hisuian starters; enable regional forms for those.
Whether to include regional forms, eg. Alolan Forms.
Doesn't include evolutions that are not regional variants themselves, eg. Sneasler, Mr. Rime; you may want to enable those separately.
Whether to include regional forms' evolutions that aren't variants themselves, eg. Sneasler, Mr. Rime.
